# Table S1

Table S1: Results from literature survey for producer-scrounger models, empirical tests and related approaches


```{r}
#| include: false
library(gt)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
targets::tar_read(literature) |>
	gt(groupname_col = 'Type') |>
	tab_options(row_group.as_column = TRUE) |>
	tab_style(  
		style = list(
      cell_text(color = "white")
		),
		locations = cells_body(
			columns = 'Species',
      rows = is.na(`Species`)
    )) |>
		tab_style(  
		style = list(
      cell_text(color = "white")
		),
		locations = cells_body(
			columns = 'Class',
      rows = is.na(`Class`)
    ))
```
